page.title: 08A day in the life of----
page.content: She gets her breakfast and dinner all in one.After she has eaten this meal, she goes to her grandmothers and does outdoor work and also some indoor work. She would do all this because her grandmother is not fit enough to do it all by herself.She then goes home for her tea.After tea she cleans the kitchen and does the hoovering then she gets ready for the band parade. She lives is in Ballyrea and her hobbies are going to band parades and practices. When she goes out she enjoys herself very much.After she does her work sometimes she goes for a walk down to the Navan Fort and back again.Beatrice goes to bed at 12.00.
